actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to permit small units of local government to satisfy the publication requirements of section 121 of the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 by publishing simplified statements of the information contained in reports submitted under such section.

summary.text: Permits specified units of local government to satisfy the publication requirements of the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 by publishing simplified statements of the information contained in reports submitted under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to permit small units of local government to satisfy the publication requirements of section 121 of the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 by publishing simplified statements of the information contained in reports submitted under such section.
